description: I developed Kisum, a B2B web application designed for event promoters and agencies. I collaborated cross-functionally with backend, frontend, and UI/UX teams to successfully deliver the application MVP. I also improved the Primuse website by optimizing performance and enhancing overall user experience.

At MINDSET LAB, I developed a job portal application from ideation to implementation and created the MINDSETLAB CREATIVE website to showcase our portfolio. I also supported the development of a WordPress project for Solusi Bangun Indonesia and contributed to major BRI projects like BRImo FSTVL, Qlola, BRImo Merchant, and BRImo Microsite by developing new features and implementing SEO strategies. Additionally, I built the ZoetisPetz App for veterinary and animal clinic users.

During my freelance journey, I developed a university website complete with registration and student check features, a mobile web app for coffee shops with QRIS payment, coupons, and real-time order notifications, and a CMS to help clients manage their product catalogs seamlessly.

At PT HEALSTATION INDONESIA, I worked on a Korean e-commerce web application tailored for dental health clinics. I was responsible for developing new features and bug fixing for a Korean Government Project, while also building landing pages and mobile apps using React Native to expand the company’s digital reach.

I contributed to PT Bank Rakyat Indonesia as a frontend developer, building web modules for various banking applications. I collaborated closely with backend developers for smooth feature integration, ensured production-level stability of the banking web apps, and worked in agile teams with clear sprint goals.

Through the DumbWays bootcamp, I completed intensive training as a fullstack developer with React, Golang, Node, and React Native. I contributed to projects like Dumbflix, Cinema Online, a Todo App, and built my own personal portfolio — sharpening both my technical and collaboration skills.
